forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 5am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. Southeast wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly sunny. High near 90, with temperatures falling to around 86 in the afternoon. South wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 7pm and 1am. Partly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 84. West northwest wind around 9 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
